abstract: The Treasury Department announced it had received repayments on its Troubled Asset Relief Program investments from Citigroup and Wells Fargo.
snippet: The Treasury Department announced it had received repayments on its Troubled Asset Relief Program investments from Citigroup and Wells Fargo.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department announced it had received repayments on its Troubled Asset Relief Program investments in Wells Fargo and Citigroup. The total came to $45 billion, bringing the entire amount of repaid funds to $164 billion.

headline.main: TARP Repayments From Citi and Wells Completed
